name: unnamed rpg (WildJam)
description:
Have you ever wanted to play an rpg, but look at the stunning graphics of today's titles and think, "Wow, I hate these absolutely stunning state-of-the-art graphics! I sure wish I could play an rpg that was nothing but text on a screen"? Well gee, I don't know what's going on in your head but your solution is right here! Introducing, *UNNAMED RPG*, your one stop-shop for all of your core role playing game needs! We've got monsters, we've got stats, we've got a world map, we've got flavor text! Stop on by and pick up your copy of *UNNAMED RPG* today!

Requirements:

- A 64 bit Windows machine

- A potato of a computer or better

- An active imagination

AN IMPORTANT NOTE ABOUT VIRUSES:

Because this game contains a windows executable (exe) file home-compiled straight from Visual Studio Code on my computer, every antivirus and google protection alarm will likely be tripped when you attempt to download and play this game. You have every right to do what you wish with your machine, and I am not responsible for any damages your machine may incur as a result of this program, BUT I can assure you that there is NOTHING DANGEROUS IN THESE FILES. Feel free to contact me directly if you have any concerns about this nature of my project.

Thanks, and have fun.
